title: Job-Integrated Online Constructivist Social Education Program

context.prior_knowledge: Possession of Basic Competencies in Social Interaction and Organizational Communication
context.additional_context: Constructivist approach program focused on social education content directly applicable to the workplaces of in-service practitioners. Enhances real-time collaboration and assessment activities using smartphones.

learning_goals: Learners can derive three or more social conflict resolution strategies by analyzing real-world case studies.
Learners can design and share solutions to social issues with peer practitioners using online collaboration tools.
Learners can systematically diagnose social problems in workplace environments and propose improvements based on constructivist learning models.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
